Reviews.Content: Great place loved the room Great rooms and price, room was nice and clean nice people
Reviews.Author: yamilegg

Reviews.Content: No Hairdryers.... This is coming from someone who works in the hotel industry and has a bit higher expectations in a hotel room. The last thing I expected was to not have a hair dryer in the room. 99% of Hotels do provide this ammenity. Office staff is not available in person 24 hours a day. I find that strange I guess they are on a reservation only or regular business hours only. This is odd being that they are located near restuarnts and other late night facilities. The suites do have a pot and pan, microwave refrigerator with ice trays. The bathroom was quite roomy.Remember to take your hair dryer!!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
